articles.title: Patriots RB TreVeyon Henderson among 6 finalists for NFL’s fan-voted Rookie of the Year award

articles.title: Report: Chargers fire offensive coordinator, OL coach after wild-card loss to Patriots
articles.description:
The Chargers scored 3 points against New England, the lowest total in the wild-card round.

articles.title: Bill Belichick breaks down what went right for the Patriots and wrong for the Chargers
articles.description:

articles.title: After viral hockey brawl among 8-year-olds, investigations are underway
articles.description:
Youth hockey organizations said they were looking into the incident. The host Hershey Bears expressed disapproval of “conduct that puts participants at risk.”

articles.title: Joe Mazzulla repeated the same two words for an entire press conference after Celtics’ loss
articles.description:

articles.title: 4 things to know about Patriots divisional-round playoff foe Texans

articles.title: Patriots to play Houston Texans in AFC divisional round
articles.description:

articles.title: Pascal Siakam and Pacers nip Celtics 98-96 for 1st 3-game win streak of season
articles.description:
Boston's Derrick White missed a go-ahead 3-point attempt in the final seconds. He had tied the game at 96-all on a driving layup with 28.6 seconds remaining.

articles.title: Anfernee Jennings made the most of his biggest opportunity of the season against the Chargers
articles.description:
